articles.title: S&P 500 touches 7,000 for first time then retreats as traders await Fed decision: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The S&P 500 rose to a milestone level ahead of the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision and earnings reports from major tech companies.
articles.content: The S&P 500 reached a milestone level on Wednesday, hitting 7,000 for the first time, before pulling back ahead of the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision and earnings reports from major tec… [+2426 chars]

articles.title: Galaxy S27 May Not Be An Exynos-Exclusive Launch, As Samsung’s 2nm GAA May Be Used To Develop A ‘Custom Tuned’ Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 Pro - Wccftech
articles.description: A custom-tuned Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 Pro fabricated on Samsung’s 2nm GAA process could be used for the Galaxy S27 series
articles.content: Samsung always seems to be facing a dilemma with its foundry business, and for its next years Galaxy S27 launch, the company would likely want nothing more than for all models to ship with the Exynos… [+2505 chars]

articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: MediaTek Estimated To Be Hit The Hardest Out Of All Chipset Manufacturers Thanks To The Memory Crisis, As More Than 50% Of Its Revenue Comes From SoC Shipments - Wccftech
articles.description: Qualcomm has largely been able to diversify its business, but a new report states that the DRAM shortage will strike MediaTek the hardest
articles.content: In the smartphone chipset shipments tally, MediaTek leads the pack as the company beat Qualcomm, Apple, and Samsung in recording the highest volume for multiple quarters. Sadly, its biggest strength … [+2360 chars]
